common.name: Name
common.acceptTerms: I agree with the <1>terms and conditions</1> and <2>privacy policy</2>.

register.title: Register
register.msgToSignIn: Already have an account? Sign in >>
register.userExistMsg: Registration failed! The user is already registered.
register.errorMsg: Registration failed! Please check the fields and try again.
register.suggestToRegister: Did you know that by registering to our service, you will be able to set yourself a job alert, keep up with the jobs you have applied and add potential jobs as favorites.
register.registerOptionCompany: I am registering as an employer
register.registerOptionApplicant: I am registering as a job seeker

login.forgotPassword: Lost your password? Reset it here
login.msgToRegister: Don't have an account yet? Register.
login.invalidMsg: Login failed! Incorrect username or password.
login.tryAgain: An error occurred. Please try again later.
login.resetPasswordSuccessMsg: New password is sent to the email address you have provided.
login.resetPasswordFailedMsg: An error occurred. Please try again with the correct email.

validation.invalidEmail: The email address you entered is invalid
validation.invalidPassword: Invalid password. Password must contain at least: 8 characters, numbers, lowercase and uppercase letters!
validation.unmatchedPassword: The passwords you entered do not match
validation.invalidDueDate: Please enter a valid date. The application period can be a minimum of 1 day and a maximum of 1-4 weeks
validation.cityInvalid: Address is invalid. Only letters allowed

advertForm.title: Post a new job
advertForm.linkInfoMsg: Please add a link to the application form here if you want to direct applicants to your own page. If you leave this field empty, then “Apply for this job” button in the job advertisement will direct users to apply via the Jobportal application form. Applications are saved into our system and you can view them in your account under “Applications”.
advertForm.agree2: I'd like to be notified about job applications by email to the following address:
advertForm.agree3: I accept the <1>service terms</1>  as well as the <2>privacy statement</2> and undertake to comply with them.
advertForm.picText: Upload an image, which will be shown as cover picture of your job post. Recommended file type .jpg and min size 1200 x 630 px. Maximum size of the attachment is 2 MB.
advertForm.errorMsg: An error occurred! Please check the fields and try again.
advertForm.apiErrorMsg: An error occurred! Please try again later.
advertForm.isDraftText: Something went wrong. The message has been saved as a draft. Please try again later.
advertForm.toggleBtnTitle: Send thank you email for all applicants

payment.note2: -feature. We will charge the above amount for this service. We will send you an invoice for the job post campaign that you have chosen, after the job post has been proofread and published.
payment.title: Order information
payment.paymentMethodTitle: How would you like to pay?
payment.bodySuccess: Thank you for your payment. Your job post is published and we have sent you an email with further details.
payment.bodySuccessService: Thank you for your payment. Our expert proofreaders will update and publish your job post. We will send you an email once it is ready to view.
payment.bodySuccessUpgrade: Thank you for your payment. Your job post has been published with the campaign of your choice.
payment.titleFailed: Your payment did not go through.
payment.bodyFailed: Something went wrong with your purchase. Please try again or choose another payment option.
payment.titleProcessed: Your payment and campaign order are already completed.
payment.titleNotFound: This transaction could not be found.
payment.bodyNotFound: Please start with posting a new job.
payment.bodyCancelled: Please start with posting a new job.
payment.titleActivatePostFailed: Oops! Something went wrong along the way.
payment.bodyActivatePostFailed: It seems payment was successful but your post could not be published. Please contact customer service.
payment.ctaBtnText: Click here to go back to your jobposts

jobs.warnToDeletePostText: Are you sure you want to delete the job post?
jobs.warnToDeleteApplicationText: Are you sure you want to delete the job application?
jobs.warnDialogText1: The advertisement will be removed from the Jobportal system.
jobs.warnDialogText2: You can no longer see ad statistics, such as views and clicks.
jobs.warnDialogText3: The ad is removed from the application service.
jobs.warnDialogText4: Job applications to this post will no longer be visible.
jobs.warnDialogText5: Application will be removed from the Jobportal system.
jobs.warnDialogText6: You can no longer see CV or other documents.

jobsList.noJobsFound: We couldn't find any matching jobs right now ...
jobsList.loginText: Login to save jobs as your favorites.

jobDetails.inactiveBtn: Application period is over. No longer receiving applications!
jobDetails.failedMsg: An error occurred. Please try again later!
jobDetails.loginText: Login to save jobs to your favorites.

homepage.title: Job alert
homepage.infoText: With the job alert, you can receive email notification of job that interests you. You can set the alert to send you notifications on a daily, weekly or monthly basis.
homepage.failedMsg: An error occurred. Please try again later!

campaigns.title: Select the desired campaign level
campaigns.campaignInfo1: When publishing your job post with a paid campaign of your choice, invoice will be created automatically. This invoice will be sent via email to the email address you have included to My information -page. Jobportal invoices its customers through Talousvirta service. Our invoicing uses a VAT rate of 24%.
campaigns.campaignInfo2: You can upgrade your selected campaign at any time. If you upgrade your campaign, Jobportal will charge you the difference of the campaign prices. Please note that the campaign you select cannot be decreased after job post is published.
campaigns.feature1: Job advertisement on the open positions page
campaigns.feature8: Distribution of the job advertisement by email to potential candidates
campaigns.feature11: Targeted marketing of the ad on social media
campaigns.type5Feature1: All the features of the Remarkable-package
campaigns.successMsg: Your job post campaign was updated successfully.
campaigns.failedMsg: Your job post campaign was not updated. Please try again!
campaigns.platformTitle: Marketing fee (50€) will be used on:
campaigns.budgetTitle: Would you like to add more budget for marketing?
campaigns.info: 90% of the added budget will be used for advertising the job post + VAT 24%. Rest will go to the marketing agency.

profile.title: Company Information*
profile.descPlaceholder: Add short introduction about your company that will appear in job advertisements.
profile.FailMsg: Your details were not updated. Please try again!
profile.companyExists: Adding company failed. This company has already been added to your user account.
profile.warnMsg: You can create vacancies after filling in this form.
profile.picText: Upload your company's logo, which will be shown on the job post. Recommended file type .png and min width 400 px. Maximum size of the attachment is 2 MB.

jobseeker.title: My Information
jobseeker.descPlaceholder: Write a short introduction about yourself. You can use this text as a base for your future applications.
jobseeker.picText: This image is visible to companies when you apply jobposts. The recommended format is .png and the minimum width is 400 pixels. The maximum size of attachments is 2 MB.
jobseeker.acceptTerms: I accept that my information can be sent to the recruiter when I apply for a job.*
jobseeker.FailMsg: Data was not updated. Please try again!

workStartLabelDate.immediately: immediately or according to the contract
workStartLabelDate.WorkAgreement: Work will begin according to agreement
workStartLabelDate.workWillBegin: Work will begin as soon as we find the right person
workStartLabelDate.asSoonAs: as soon as we find the right person

applicant.descPlaceholder: Write shortly about yourself and why you would be suitable for the job
applicant.interviewTitle: Send the applicant a reminder of the interview
applicant.emailSuccessMsg: Reminder sent to applicant's email address
applicant.emailFailedMsg: Reminder not sent. Please try again!
applicant.failedMsg: Note wasn't added. Please try again!
applicant.applicationSentfailedMsg: An error occurred. Please try again later.

adDetails.failedMsg: Notification status not updated. Please try again!

adminMarketing.feature1: Sharing an advertisement on social media
adminMarketing.feature2: Targeted marketing of the advertisement on social media
adminMarketing.failedMsg: Marketing data not updated. Please try again!

notFound.title: Sorry, this page is not available.
notFound.body: The link you followed may be broken or the page may have been deleted.

dropzone.invalidImage: Invalid file format selected. Allowed formats are: png, jpg, jpeg
dropzone.invalidCV: Invalid file format selected. Allowed formats are: pdf, doc, docx
dropzone.fileMaxSizeMsg: This file is too large to upload. The maximum support file size is 2 MB.
